AddColumn.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] Adds a column to the listview.

[string] column
  The name of the column to add.

[string] material
  The material to apply to the column.

Appears to only get applied if the listview is set to not be sortable.

[number] position
  Sets the ordering of this column compared to other columns.

Does not appear to be implemented.

AddLine.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] 

[vararg] text
  Values for a new row in the DListView, If several arguments are supplied, each argument will correspond to a respective column in the DListView.

ColumnWidth.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] 

[number] column
  The column to get the width of.

DoDoubleClick.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] Called when a line in the DListView is double clicked.

[number] lineID
  The line number of the double clicked line.

[Panel] line
  The double clicked DListView_Line.

GetLine.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] Gets the DListView_Line at the given index.

[number] id
  The index of the line to get.

GetLines.description: DLISTVIEW [Client] Gets all of the lines added to the DListView.

GetSortedID.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] 

[number] lineId
  The DListView_Line:GetID of a line to look up

OnClickLine.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] 

[Panel] line
  The selected line.

[boolean] isSelected
  Boolean indicating whether the line is selected.

OnRequestResize.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] 

[Panel] column
  The column which initialized the resize

[number] size

OnRowRightClick.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] 

[number] lineID
  The line ID of the right clicked line

[Panel] line
  The line panel itself, a DListView_Line.

OnRowSelected.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] 

[number] rowIndex
  The index of the row that the user clicked on.

[Panel] row
  The DListView_Line that the user clicked on.

RemoveLine.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] 

[number] line
  Removes the given row, by row id (same number as DListView:GetLine).

SelectItem.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] 

[Panel] Line
  The line to select.

SetDataHeight.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] 

[number] height
  The new height to set. Default value is 17.

SetHeaderHeight.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] 

[number] height
  The new height to set. Default value is 16.

SetHideHeaders.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] 

[boolean] hide
  Whether the header line should be visible on not.

SetMultiSelect.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] 

[boolean] allowMultiSelect
  Whether multiple lines can be selected or not

SetSortable.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] 

[boolean] isSortable
  Whether sorting columns with clicking is allowed or not.

SortByColumn.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] 

[number] columnIndex
  The index of the column that should be sorted.

[boolean] descending=false
  Whether the items should be sorted in descending order or not.

SortByColumns.description:
DLISTVIEW [Client] Sorts the list based on given columns. All arguments are optional

[number] column1=nil
  

[boolean] descrending1=false
  

[number] column2=nil
  

[boolean] descrending2=false
  

[number] column3=nil
  

[boolean] descrending3=false
  

[number] column4=nil
  

[boolean] descrending4=false
